q_text: How confident are you in the safety of the COVID-19 vaccine
Vaccines have not been adequately tested for safety.
Vaccines overwhelm a child’s undeveloped immune system
Vaccines can cause or worsen allergies
Vaccines introduce unnatural toxins into the body
Getting vaccinated helps protect those who are unable to be vaccinated against disease
Given all the COVID-19 variants, the protective effects of the vaccine do not last.
If vaccinating against COVID-19, you will test positive.
The more people who get vaccinated the greater the protection against disease
Strong immune system, not vaccination, have reduced COVID-19 infections.
Homeopathic medicines are an effective alternative to conventional vaccines
Building immunity by naturally fighting off a disease is better protection than getting a vaccine.
It is important that people are able to make their own decisions about vaccination.
It should be compulsory for all children over 12 y/o to be vaccinated.
It is okay for people to be exempt from vaccination for moral or personal reasons.
People should be able to decide whether or not to vaccinate against COVID-19.
Pharmaceutical companies create ineffective vaccines in order to make high profit.
The government conceals information about the safety of vaccines.
Pharmaceutical companies purposefully conceal information about the safety of vaccines.
